features: [Outstanding Cleaning Power] High-density microfiber provides great friction to scrub stubborn stains and dirt. The enhanced three-layer design allows steam to disperse evenly while minimizing heat loss. Don't be surprised by the spotless floors after mopping with the schenley microfiber pads

[Incredible Absorbency] Made of materials with great absorbency, the microfiber pads enable steam to penetrate and disperse instantly. More importantly, with these microfiber pads, floors can dry up in a matter of minutes

[Reusable & Machine Washable] The premium microfiber pads are tough enough to withstand repeated washing. It can be washed by any regular washing machine using cold-water washing and tumble dry, offering a hassle-free cleaning experience
[Design for Different Surfaces] Whether you have hardwood floors, tiles, marble or laminates, these steam mop pads are great for cleaning all your floors on the go

[Super Easy to Set Up] Opposite-facing velcro hooks are placed on the head of the steam mop cleaner to stick the microfiber pads firmly. Just attach a microfiber pad to the head of the steam mop and enjoy cleaning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reusable & Ultra-Durable The microfiber pads have a high degree of durability. The pads have an extended lifetime of over 1000 hours of hard use. Just throw these microfiber pads into the washing machine, and you will get brand-new pads without a hassle! Easy & Delightful Cleaning No need to rub back and forth rapidly over tough and sticky spots. No more squatting down to scrub floors when removing stubborn grime. Just attach a pad to Schenley steam mop and enjoy a simple, graceful and sweat-free cleaning experience! Washable & Quick-Drying Microfiber materials allow moisture to evaporate in a short period of time, giving the pads a speedy dry-up time. Just sit the pads in a dry and well-ventilated place. No need to worry about the musty odor caused by the damp pads anymore! Floor Cleaning Secret Hack Benefiting from great absorbency, Schenley microfiber pads significantly decrease the damage to the floors caused by over-wetting. Meanwhile, the high-density microfiber equips the pads with outstanding performance in trapping dirt, dust, and pet dander!

Perfectly Compatible The well-tailored microfiber pads are perfectly compatible with Schenley Hestia steam mop cleaner. The perfect cleaning combo enables powerful steam to disperse evenly to the floors in just 15 seconds, offering an effective cleaning solution. Super Easy to Set up Velcro hooks on the mop are placed in opposite directions to adhere loops on the microfiber pad. Place the pad on the floor and simply adhere the mop, the pad will be firmly attached and have ultra-stable performance on different surfaces. 6 Packs Included Six packs of microfiber pads are included in one package. You can change a new pad when washing the old one. No need to worry about being short of pads! Once you have tried the pads, you cannot go back to life without these powerful pads. Strong Cleaning Power The pads have an outstanding performance in trapping dirt, dust, and pet hair. Just like other microfiber materials, the pads have a slight positive charge and thus can attract negatively charged dusty bits, providing strong cleaning power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely amazing!I always had a hard time cleaning with swiffer wet +dry . I had to change the pad several times when it gets dry or dirty. But this steamer is now my life changer . It fell many times bc of my baby but nothing was broken. Design is beautiful especially when you love pink color. With one mop, I clean living room and kitchen and I changed it to a new one for bedroom. You can machine wash and dry. I will order more mop so I can clean more. Cleaning is fun now!
